instruction: Locate the document containing the company's revenue information for 2025 and update the revenue figure to $5 million.

result.command: if cat XYZ_Corporation_Revenue_2025.txt 2>/dev/null | grep -i '\$5\|5,000,000\|5000000\|5 million\|5M' | wc -l | grep -q '[1-9]' || grep -r '\$5\|5,000,000\|5000000\|5 million\|5M' . 2>/dev/null | grep -v 'XYZ_Corporation_Revenue_2025.txt' | wc -l | grep -q '[1-9]'; then echo 'REVENUE_UPDATED'; fi
